ingredients: 6 ounces fresh tomatillos - husked, rinsed, and halved, 1 tablespoon thinly sliced serrano chiles, or to taste, 1 large ripe avocado - halved, seeded, and flesh scooped out of peel,   +   1/4 cup packed cilantro leaves,   +   1/2  lime, juiced,   salt to taste
nutrition: Total Fat 7g 9%, Saturated Fat 1g 5%, Sodium 5mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 6g 2%, Dietary Fiber 4g 14%, Total Sugars 2g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 11mg 54%, Calcium 11mg 1%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 325mg 7%
